title: 新的Minecraft书籍已经出版！建造一个宏伟的中世纪王国吧！
author: Wolverine
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Wolverine 于 2016-10-6 08:07 编辑 



Hear ye! Hear ye! Today we’re releasing Exploded Builds: Medieval Fortress - a new book that teaches you how to put together your own medieval kingdom piece by (possibly plague-ridden) piece.
走过路过不要错过！我们今天出版了新的Minecraft书籍：Exploded Builds: Medieval Fortress - 主要内容就是如何一步步建立起一个中世纪王国。

If you’re a history nerd like me, it’s an absolute delight, jam-packed with both Minecraft and medieval facts, and full of gorgeous rendered diagrams demonstrating how each bit of your mighty castle plugs together. It has ramparts, dungeons, everything in between and a good deal outside too, from Ye Olde taverns to bustling market squares. It’s not just about antique architectural artistry either: the book includes detailed explanations of redstone engineering, helping you to construct elaborate trap rooms, a switch-activated portcullis, ballistas and loads more.
如果你和我一样对历史非常着迷，你有福了。本书讲述的不仅仅只有Minecraft和中世纪，还有很多大触级别的宏伟城堡渲染图。城墙，地牢，等等一切应有尽有。叶奥尔德酒馆和热闹的市场的构造图也在其中。本书不单单描述了仿古的建筑：还包括如何运用红石的详细教程，比如建造一个精心设计的陷阱房间，需要激活才能启动的开关门，弩车还有更多。

It’s probably one of the nicest looking things we’ve produced, too. Just look:
它的外观非常精致，欣赏一下：







It costs ?12.99, though you may be able to get a sweet discount from some retailers. The US release will follow shortly. 
本书的售价为12.99欧元，从零售商手中购买可以稍微便宜一点。美国地区在不久后也能购买。

You can order it here!
在这里订购吧！
